languages.text: Сухожилия аккуратно рассечены тонким и острым лезвием, чтобы искалечить вас, но не лишить возможности двигаться окончательно.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
languages.original_text: Сухожилия аккуратно рассечены тонким и острым лезвием, чтобы искалечить вас, но не лишить возможности двигаться окончательно.

traits.locale_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.
Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

languages.text: あなたの腱は、動く能力を完全に奪うことなく、それでも自由を奪うために、薄く鋭い刃物で注意深く切られている。
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: あなたの腱は、動く能力を完全に奪うことなく、それでも自由を奪うために、薄く鋭い刃物で注意深く切られている。

languages.text: 你的筋腱被薄而锋利的手术刀小心翼翼地切开，让你基本处于瘫痪状态，却又没彻底剥夺你的移动能力。
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: 你的筋腱被薄而锋利的手术刀小心翼翼地切开，让你基本处于瘫痪状态，却又没彻底剥夺你的移动能力。

languages.text: Tus tendones han sido cortados cuidadosamente con una hoja fina y afilada para incapacitarte sin privarte por completo de la capacidad de moverte.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: Tus tendones han sido cortados cuidadosamente con una hoja fina y afilada para incapacitarte sin privarte por completo de la capacidad de moverte.

languages.text: Deine Sehnen wurden sorgfältig mit einer dünnen und scharfen Klinge zerschnitten worden, um dich zu verkrüppeln, ohne dich vollständig bewegungsunfähig zu machen.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: Deine Sehnen wurden sorgfältig mit einer dünnen und scharfen Klinge zerschnitten worden, um dich zu verkrüppeln, ohne dich vollständig bewegungsunfähig zu machen.

languages.text: Vos tendons ont été soigneusement incisés à l'aide d'une lame fine et tranchante afin de vous estropier sans pour autant empêcher tout mouvement.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: Vos tendons ont été soigneusement incisés à l'aide d'une lame fine et tranchante afin de vous estropier sans pour autant empêcher tout mouvement.

languages.text: Uzvunu hareket kabiliyetini tamamen elinden almadan kesmek için ince ve keskin bir bıçakla tendonların dikkatlice kesiliyor.
languages.original_text: Your tendons have been carefully cut with a thin and sharp blade in order to cripple you without completely robbing you of the ability to move.

traits.locale_text: Uzvunu hareket kabiliyetini tamamen elinden almadan kesmek için ince ve keskin bir bıçakla tendonların dikkatlice kesiliyor.
